dmca.title: DMCA (Copyright) Complaint to Google
dmca.sender_name: Hotels of the Rich and Famous

works.description:
The photo of Bridgetta Tomarchio by Dave 

Edwards was sent personally by Dave Edwards for use on my website.  
Bridgetta Tomarchio also now works for my website as a writer. These
people  
steal my images and then lower the rank of the image. This image used to
be  
#1 on the 1st image search page!!!! Now it's #7 and doesn't even go to my 

site even though I got the permission to use it, then they stole it from
my  
site. Note my white text beneath the image.  They also have a popup
remover  
and back button disabler.
